name: ALF40
headline: Discreet bass-enhancer
description: A compact, hidden bass-enhancer designed to disappear into walls, ceilings, cabinetry, or joinery while subtly reinforcing low frequencies in distributed audio systems.
heroCopy: A subtle lift in bass — concealed within the architecture, precisely vented for clean support.
story: ALF40 is designed for spaces where visual quiet is essential. Its adjustable ported architecture allows it to integrate seamlessly into the build, reinforcing low frequencies without visual intrusion. Ideal for distributed audio systems requiring gentle, controlled bass support.
definition: Ultra-discreet passive bass-enhancer for distributed architectural audio systems.
finish: Concealed in wall / ceiling / cabinetry / joinery

name: ALF80
headline: High-performance discreet subwoofer
description: A concealed passive subwoofer delivering deeper extension and greater output while remaining fully integrated within architectural elements.
heroCopy: Greater depth and authority — concealed within the structure.
story: ALF80 is engineered for spaces requiring more bass presence without visible hardware. Adjustable porting and flexible vent locations allow it to remain hidden while delivering scale and impact suitable for music and media environments.
definition: High-output discreet passive subwoofer for architectural audio systems.
finish: Concealed in wall / ceiling / cabinetry / joinery

name: ALF100CV
headline: Mechanically isolated discreet subwoofer
description: A concealed 4th-order band-pass subwoofer designed to deliver deep, controlled bass while minimising vibration transfer into the building structure.
heroCopy: Deep bass with structural isolation — power without vibration.
story: ALF100CV is built for demanding architectural installations where vibration control is critical. Its mechanically isolated mounting system reduces structure-borne resonance while configurable venting allows flexible integration within cavity construction.
definition: High-performance discreet subwoofer with mechanical isolation.
finish: Concealed in cavity wall / ceiling / cabinetry

name: ALF100SM
headline: Plaster-up-to discreet subwoofer
description: A high-output discreet subwoofer designed to plaster directly into cavity construction for seamless architectural integration.
heroCopy: Powerful bass, seamlessly finished — plaster-up-to integration.
story: ALF100SM is intended for large rooms where bass performance must be felt but never seen. It integrates directly into cavity walls or ceilings, venting discreetly through architectural detailing.

name: ALF50SM
headline: Compact discreet subwoofer
description: A compact architectural subwoofer providing controlled low-frequency reinforcement with minimal visual impact.
heroCopy: Compact bass support — designed for invisible integration.
story: ALF50SM offers discreet low-frequency reinforcement for smaller architectural spaces, pairing naturally with Amina invisible loudspeakers while preserving the visual language of the interior.
definition: Compact discreet subwoofer for architectural audio systems.
finish: Integrated into cavity construction or cabinetry
